title: VA - Classical Favourites (3 CD) [1994]  FLAC
description:
Please seed!

VA - Classical Favourites (3 CD)
This release, Sweden 1994

With art work (Swedish)

For more info on writing credits track 4, CD1 
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Remo_Giazotto

Composers: Giazotto, Remo, (Albinoni, Tomaso Giovanni); Bach, Johann Sebastian;
Beethoven, Ludwig van; Elgar, Edward; Gershwin, George; Gluck, Christoph
Willibald; Grieg, Edvard;  Handel, George Frideric; Haydn, Franz Joseph;
Mozart, Wolfgang Amadeus; Orff, Carl; Pachelbel, Johann; Prokofiev, Sergey;
Ravel, Maurice; Rodrigo, Joaquin; Satie, Erik; Schubert, Franz; Sibelius, Jean;
Tchaikovsky, Pyotr Il'yich; Vivaldi, Antonio

CD 1 Baroque Favourites
01  Handel: Arrival of the Queen of Sheba (Solomon)
02  Bach: Suite In D Major, No. 3: Air
03  Bach: Suite No. 2 in B Minor, "Badinerie"
04  Giazotto: Adagio in G Minor (attrib. to Albinoni)
05  Vivaldi: The 4 Seasons: Violin Concerto in E Major, Op. 8, No. 1,
             RV 269, "La primavera" (Spring): I. Allegro
06  Vivaldi: Flautino Concerto No. 11 in C Major, RV 443: Largo
07  Handel: Fireworks Music - La rejouissance
08  Handel: Serse (Xerxes), HWV 40: Larghetto
09  Pachebel: Canon
10  Gluck: Dance of the Blessed Spirits (Orfeo ed Euridice)
11  Handel: Water Music: Suite No. 2 in D Major, HWV 349: II. Alla Hornpipe
12  Bach: Toccata in D Minor, BWV 565 
13  Albinoni: Oboe Concerto No. 2 in D Minor, Op. 9: Adagio
14  Bach: Piano Concerto No. 5 in F Minor, BWV 1056: Largo 
15  Haydn: Trumpet Concerto in E-Flat Major, Hob.VIIe:1: III. Finale: Allegro
16  Mozart: Piano Concerto No. 21 in C Major, K. 467, "Elvira Madigan": II. Andante 
17  Handel: Messiah: Hallelujah!

CD 2 Favourites from the time of Beethoven and Mozart
01  Beethoven: Symphony No. 5 in C Minor, Op. 67: I. Allegro con brio
02  Beethoven: Romance for Violin & Orchestra No. 2, Op.50
03  Beethoven: Piano Sonata No. 14 in C-Sharp Minor, Op. 27, No. 2, "Moonlight"
               I. Adagio sostenuto
04  Mozart: Piano Sonata No. 11, K 331  (Marcia) Alla Turca
05  Beethoven: Bagatelle in A Minor, WoO 59, "FÃ¼r Elise"
06  Mozart: Symphony No. 40 in G Minor, K. 550: I. Molto allegro
07  Mozart: Violin Concerto No. 3 in G Major, K. 216: II. Adagio
08  Mozart: Requiem in D Minor, K. 626: Sequence: VI. Lacrimosa dies illa
09  Schubert: Impromptu No. 6 in A-Flat Major, Op. 142/2, D. 935, No. 2
10  Mozart: Concerto for Clarinet and Orchestra in A Major, K. 622: Adagio
11  Beethoven: Symphony No. 9 in D Minor, Op. 125, "Choral": IV.
               Finale: Presto - Allegro assai (excerpt)

CD 3 Romantic and 20th Century Music
01  Orff: Carmina Burana, 'O Fortuna'
02  Grieg: Suite No. 1, Op. 46, 'Peer Gynt', 'In the Hall of the Mountain King'
03  Gershwin: Rhapsody in Blue
04  Sibelius: Finlandia, Op. 26
05  Rodrigo: Concierto de Aranjuez, II. Adagio
06  Satie: Gymnopedi no. 1
07  Tchaikovsky: Sleeping Beauty, Op. 66,  Waltz
08  Prokofiev: Suite no. 2 from Romeo and Juliet, Op. 64 'Montagues and Capulets'
09  Grieg:  12 Songs, Op. 33: No. 2. VÃ¥ren (Last Spring)
10  Elgar: Pomp and Circumstance Marches, No. 1: Allegro con molto
11  Ravel: Bolero
